description: This file defines the AddEditNoteFragment class, which manages the UI for adding or editing a note within an Android application. It handles user input, pre-filling fields when editing, validation, and navigation upon saving a note.

classes.name: AddEditNoteFragment
classes.description: A Fragment for adding or editing notes, supporting data prefill, validation, and navigation.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout for the add/edit note screen.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components, populates fields if editing an existing note, sets up save button click handler for validation, saving, and navigation.
